Address.title: Address
Address.description: The address field to be populated with the Candidate's Address from the CV Document Format: Text

CTC.title: CTC
CTC.description: For the Cost_To_Company__c field, ask them what their total cost to company is and populate accordingly

CareerGloals.title: CareerGloals
CareerGloals.description: For the Career_Goals__c field, find out from the candidate what their career goals are, and populate the field according to their answer

CareerTitle.title: CareerTitle
CareerTitle.description: Their Career Title will be found on their CV on the last held position, for example Salesforce Developer, Salesforce Architect, Salesforce Admin ETC

Certs.title: Certs
Certs.description: Data Type: Long Text: Extracted from the candidate's CV using Einstein's data parsing found from the Certification's section on the CV Document. Format: Write in Bullet Point Format

Consultingorinhouse.title: Consultingorinhouse
Consultingorinhouse.description: For the Prefer_Working_Inhouse_Or_Consulting__c field, ask the candidate if they would prefer working as a consultancy or inhouse/ directly for the client and populate the field accordingly

DOB.title: DOB
DOB.description: The Date Field to be populated with the Candidate's date of birth from the CV Document Format: YYYY-MM-DD IF there is no date of birth on the CV this can be ignored

Education.title: Education
Education.description: Data Type: Rich Text: Extracted from the candidate's CV using Einstein's data parsing found from the Education section on the CV Document. Format: Rich Text Bullet Point Institution Qualification Year Qualified Any other information mentioned like subjects, activities, affiliations etc

Email.title: Email
Email.description: The Email to be populated with the Candidate's email address from the CV Document Format: Email

FName.title: FName
FName.description: The first Name/s of the Candidate found on their CV Document

LName.title: LName
LName.description: The last Name of the Candidate found on their CV Document

Languages.title: Languages
Languages.description: Data Type: Rich Text: Extracted from the candidate's CV using Einstein's data parsing found from the Certification's section on the CV Document. Format: text, seperated by , example: English, Spanish

Phone.title: Phone
Phone.description: The phone to be populated with the Candidate's Phone/ Contact/ Mobile/ Phone Number from the CV Document Format: Phone

Reasonforleaving.title: Reasonforleaving
Reasonforleaving.description:
for the Reason_for_leaving_current_role__c field,, populate from their last role if they did provide a reason
If they did not provide a reason, ask them why they want to leave their current job and and populate the field accordingly

Seniority.title: Seniority
Seniority.description: For the Seniority__c field, based on their current position and title and years of experience you can make your call weather they are Entry mid or Senior

Skills.title: Skills
Skills.description: Data Type: Long Text: Extracted from the candidate's CV using Einstein's data parsing found from the skills section on the CV Document. Format: Write in Bullet Point Format

Socials.title: Socials
Socials.description: The Candidate's Socials found on their CV, only list what is listed on CV Format: Long text, Document for Example Twitter: Github: Trailhead: LinkedIn:

Summary.title: Summary
Summary.description: This is a summary of the Candidate done by the Agent, summarising their overall CV. Format: Long Text Example: This Candidate is a Salesforce Architect and has 7 years Professional working experience with 5 years in Salesforce, they have a degree in Computer Sciences and 5 Salesforce Certifications

VarDOB.title: VarDOB
VarDOB.description: The Date Field to be populated with the Candidate's date of birth from the CV Document Format: YYYY-MM-DD IF there is no date of birth on the CV this can be ignored

Willingtoworkcontract.title: Willingtoworkcontract
Willingtoworkcontract.description: for the Willing_to_work_Contract_Work__c field, ask them if they would be willing to do contract work and populate accordingly

WorkHistory.title: WorkHistory
WorkHistory.description: Data Type: Rich Text: Extracted from the candidate's CV using Einstein's data parsing found from the Work/ Professional Experience section on the CV Document. Format: Rich Text Title | Company Name | Location | Date from and To Bullet point of their duties, Projects they worked on, Achievements and anything else they mentioned Reason for leaving if on CV

recordId.title: recordId
recordId.description: This is the Candidate__c record and the record's ID is to be pushed in to the recordId variable
